requirementText.name: Agent other type
requirementText.description: The mandatory agent element MUST have a @OTHERTYPE attribute with the value "SOFTWARE". See also: Other agent type, https://earkcsip.dilcis.eu/#VocabularyAgentOtherType.

testCase.description: The mets/metsHdr/agent with @ROLE='CREATOR' MUST have: - mets/metsHdr/agent/@OTHERTYPE MUST exist. - mets/metsHdr/agent/@OTHERTYPE MUST have the value 'SOFTWARE'.

rule.description: For the CSIP mandatory agent element, mets/metsHdr/agent/@OTHERTYPE MUST exist.

error.message: The CSIP mandatory agent element (i.e. mets/metsHdr/agent[@ROLE='CREATOR']) mets/metsHdr/agent/@OTHERTYPE attribute does not exist. MUST be: attribute exists and has the value 'SOFTWARE'.
